title: Interactive Foliage
description: Enables you to be interactive with your Foliage.
longDescription:
Spawn any blueprint actor when interacting with Instanced Foliage, enables you to harvest any kind of resource you want, be it Trees, Rocks, Plants, whatever you want.


Useful when combined with a crafting/inventory system that enables you to harvest resources. The Foliage System now also supports re-spawning Foliage Instances in the same location it was harvested in.


Multiplayer is supported, removed foliage is saved and applied to clients that join an in progress game.
technicalDetails:
Features

  • Replaces a Foliage Instance with a Blueprint that you can interact with
  • Works with Foliage Placement tool & Procedural foliage volumes
  • Supports respawning foliage instances


Number of Blueprints: 7

Input: Keyboard/Mouse

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, IOS

Documentation: http://eeldev.com/index.php/foliage-system-for-unreal-engine-4/


Notes: Does NOT support tiled landscapes or World Componsition, take a look at the "Foliage Plugin" if you need this functionality.
